data.title: 230+ Unique & Cool Baby Boy Names (With Meanings)
data.meta_description: On the hunt for cool baby boy names you wonâ€™t find anywhere else? Check out our list of cute and unique boy names and their meanings.
data.text:
On the hunt for unique, cool baby boy names you wonâ€™t find anywhere else?

Check out our list of rare and cool boy names, with their meanings.

Naming your little guy sets the tone for their grand entrance into the world and their life ahead.

With plenty of cool baby boy names out there, you can find one that you love that also carries a special meaning.

What matters most of all is that you fall in love with the name and have it ready to go when your babe arrives.

And weâ€™re here to help!

Our list of over 230 cool baby boy names and their meanings includes unique boy names and popular but cool boy names.

Chances are youâ€™ll see something on our list that you adore â€” and some names that you havenâ€™t seen anywhere else.

In this article: ğŸ“

What are cool and unique names for a boy?

Picking a cool name doesnâ€™t have to be always the most popular boysâ€™ names â€” some on this list, you might recognize, but others are truly unique.

Check out these cool names that have a boho zing to them.

These are unique boy names for those who want something fun, light-hearted, and downright cool.

What are some unique boy names?

If youâ€™re on the hunt for cute boy names that wonâ€™t match everyone else in his preschool class, consider one of these cool names for boys.

How unique a name is depends on when you ask the question.

Name popularity rises and falls with the times, with some names heading from obscurity to popularity in the space of a few years.

Take the name Elio, for example. From a humble 1082nd place in 2020, it rose to position 842 of the most popular names for boys the following year.

And then thereâ€™s the lovely name Amiri, which went up a whopping 534 places.

Whichever of these unique names you choose, you know heâ€™ll stand out from the crowd â€” in the best way.

What is a powerful unique name for a boy?

If you want your boy to be one-of-a-kind and leader of the pack, then check out these unique baby boy names that pack a power punch:

Aimilios: A name in the same family as the popular name Emily, Aimilios has Greek roots and means â€œstrength.â€

Amell: This one has German roots and means â€œthe strength of an eagle.â€

Ansaldo: This mighty name with Germanic roots means â€œthe power of God.â€

Arsenio: With its Greek roots, Arsenio means â€œmanlyâ€ and â€œstrong.â€

Buggi: Donâ€™t be fooled by the cute sound of this name. From its Nordic roots, it means â€œpowerful man.â€

Chasin: This Hebrew name simply means â€œstrong.â€

Egon: This mighty little German name means â€œstrong with a sword.â€

Farrell: An Irish surname, this powerful name means â€œman of valor.â€

Fermin: With its Spanish roots, Fermin means â€œstrong.â€

Hariric: From Germanic origins, Hariric means â€œpowerful army.â€

Honovi: A mighty name with Hopi roots, Honovi means â€œstrong deer.â€

Idris: Fans of Mr. Elba might find this a fitting option. It has Arabic roots and means â€œsmart.â€

Imre: From Hungarian roots, Imre means â€œstrength.â€

Malthe: This one has Danish roots and means â€œruleâ€ or â€œhave power.â€

Meinrad: With German roots, Meinrad means â€œstrong advisor.â€

Nero: This supremely powerful Latin name refers to the Roman emperor and means â€œstern.â€ (So that you can make an informed decision, he was the emperor who fiddled while Rome burned.)

Osiris: In Egyptian mythology, Osiris is the god of both life and death. Thatâ€™s pretty powerful.

Pruitt: With its English roots, Pruitt means â€œbrave one.â€

Tedmond: Meaning â€œprotector of the land,â€ this English name can be shortened to the adorable Teddy.

Zale: With its Greek origins, Zale means â€œsea strength.â€

Popular cool boy names

While the boy names that top the charts fluctuate, there are some popular boy names that remain on the podium year after year.

Here are some baby boy names that are bound to be cool for many years to come.

What is the rarest boy name?

The rarest baby boy name is Rome, but other rare baby boy names include Chester, Henley, and Maynard.

Finding a rare baby boy name means discovering a unique fit for your little one.

Throughout their life, theyâ€™ll have a special spot in the world and likely wonâ€™t meet too many others with their moniker.

Sometimes the most unique boy names are ones that draw inspiration from different parts of the world.

Check out these rare boy names you probably havenâ€™t seen before.

What are some badass names for a boy?

A badass name for a boy is Maverick, but other badass names include Lennox, Thor, Jace, and Xander.

If the name you choose sounds tough and original, thatâ€™s a great combination for a badass name.

With a cool baby boy name like this, your son will be ready to take on the world.

What are some edgy boy names?

Edgier unique boy names include Kai, Wolf, Dax, Jett, and Mack.

These names have a cool sound to them and are different from other names that top the popularity charts.

Great modern names and even some older ones can be rehashed to bring flair and personality to your sonâ€™s name.

There you have it â€’ our top 237 unique and cool boy names, perfect for your little peanut.

Found a few but want a second opinion? Join our Peanut community of other moms-to-be to share your favorites.

Stay cool, mama.
